ComicInfo.Series: Housewives at Play: Ties That Bind
ComicInfo.Summary:
Back BlurbTies That Bind brings together a group of the horniest housewives ever assembled. Ravenous housewives who take everyday situations and turn them into insatiable growing lust. Whether it be tied to a fence or signpost, chained to the patio furniture, bound to a hot glowing barbecue, or strapped down to the kitchen counters, these girls are out to torture each other until the tears begin to flow. Using all kinds of household objects to fill their body cavities, such as half-filled champagne bottles, cookie dough packages, and enema bags -- that's just the beginning of where they can go with their imagination. Hot moms, soccer moms, daughters and sisters, no female is left untouched. Only Rebecca can take us to the horniest neighborhood in the world and give new meaning to the lyrics "Won't You Be My Neighbor?"
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:03:37. [CVDB316255]
